#summary Reading a Properties File

= Reading from a Properties =

The easiest way to load a properties file is to use the method: 

   PropertiesFile loadPropertiesFile(fileName)

PropertiesFile extends java.util.Properties  and adds some methods for converting properties values to commonly used types.


When your properties file are in the root of your app's WEB-INF folder.  You only need to specify the name of the file to load the file.
{{{
   def propFile = loadPropertiesFile('db.properties')
   Integer port = propFile.getInt('server.port')
   String url = propFile.get('server.url')
}}}
